comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
mezze: The snake could possibly have some kind of symbolic meaning (death or eternity might have been suggested), but that's nothing we know for sure. The Viking Age art is actually full of snakes as a motif not only on rune stones. 

/Anna B.
